tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE locations (location_id INT PRIMARY KEY, latitude FLOAT, longitude FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE regions (region_id INT PRIMARY KEY, region_name VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE spatial_data (data_id INT PRIMARY KEY, location_id INT, region_id INT, INDEX spatial_index (location_id, region_id));
CREATE TABLE Locations (   id INT PRIMARY KEY,   name STRING NOT NULL,   location GEOMETRY NOT NULL,   INDEX idx_location (location) )
CREATE TABLE Users (   user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   name STRING NOT NULL,   email STRING NOT NULL,   location_id INT,   INDEX idx_location_id (location_id) )
CREATE TABLE Events (   event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   name STRING NOT NULL,   location_id INT,   date DATE NOT NULL,   INDEX idx_date (date) )
CREATE TABLE Coordinates (   coordinate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   latitude DOUBLE NOT NULL,   longitude DOUBLE NOT NULL,   INDEX idx_coordinates (latitude, longitude) )
